QuestData.Title: Yan Quillpaw
QuestData.Description: You have already defeated Kuo-Na Quillpaw. You have not yet fought her brother, Yan.$b$bHe will meet you at the Pedestal of Hope, and he will not hold back. His reputation as a trainer is at stake.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Yan has been on this island for decades. Fighting is his life.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat Yan Quillpaw at the Pedestal of Hope.
